org.fluentjava.reflection
Class ReflectiveGetter

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.reflection.ReflectiveGetter

public class ReflectiveGetter
extends Object

Utility class that finds getters and fields. RuntimeReflectionException is thrown if any exceptions are caught while reflecting upon the object.

Constructor Summary
ReflectiveGetter()
           
 
Method Summary
 Object getFieldAttribute(Object target, String fieldName)
          Reflectively searches one public attribute called fieldName and get its value.
 Object getFieldOrGetter(Object target, String fieldName)
          Tries to get fieldName by using a getter, and if i can't, will try public fields.
 Object getFromGetter(Object target, String getterName)
          Searches a public getter methods and invoke it on target.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

getFieldAttribute

public Object getFieldAttribute(Object target,
                                String fieldName)
Reflectively searches one public attribute called fieldName and get its value.

Parameters:
target -
fieldName -
Returns:

getFromGetter

public Object getFromGetter(Object target,
                            String getterName)
Searches a public getter methods and invoke it on target. That is: public methods starting with is or get, receiving no arguments and returning anything. If two getters exist, one will be picked arbitrarily.

Parameters:
target -
getterName -
Returns:

getFieldOrGetter

public Object getFieldOrGetter(Object target,
                               String fieldName)
Tries to get fieldName by using a getter, and if i can't, will try public fields. In other words, it combines the functionalities of getFieldAttribute(Object, String) and getFromGetter(Object, String).

Parameters:
target -
fieldName -
Returns:
